dark.name: Thème Sombre
dark.description: Thème sombre moderne avec couleurs bleues
dark.stylesheet: QMainWindow { background-color: #2b2b2b; } QWidget { background-color: #2b2b2b; color: #ffffff; } QPushButton { background-color: #3d3d3d; color: #ffffff; border: none; padding: 8px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: bold; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #4a9eff; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #2d7acc; } QCheckBox { color: #ffffff; spacing: 8px; font-weight: bold; } QCheckBox::indicator { width: 20px; height: 20px; border-radius: 3px; } QCheckBox::indicator:unchecked { background-color: #3d3d3d; border: 2px solid #666666; } QCheckBox::indicator:checked { background-color: #27ae60; border: 2px solid #27ae60; image: url(data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 20 20'><text x='2' y='16' font-size='16' font-weight='bold' fill='white'>✓</text></svg>); } QCheckBox::indicator:checked:hover { background-color: #2ecc71; } QMenuBar { background-color: #2b2b2b; color: #ffffff; border-bottom: 1px solid #3d3d3d; } QMenu { background-color: #2b2b2b; color: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #3d3d3d; } QMenu::item:selected { background-color: #4a9eff; }

light.name: Thème Clair
light.stylesheet: QMainWindow { background-color: #ffffff; } QWidget { background-color: #ffffff; color: #000000; } QPushButton { background-color: #e0e0e0; color: #000000; border: 1px solid #999999; padding: 8px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: bold; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #0066cc; color: #ffffff; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #004499; } QCheckBox { color: #000000; spacing: 8px; font-weight: bold; } QCheckBox::indicator { width: 20px; height: 20px; border-radius: 3px; } QCheckBox::indicator:unchecked { background-color: #ffffff; border: 2px solid #cccccc; } QCheckBox::indicator:checked { background-color: #27ae60; border: 2px solid #27ae60; image: url(data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 20 20'><text x='2' y='16' font-size='16' font-weight='bold' fill='white'>✓</text></svg>); } QCheckBox::indicator:checked:hover { background-color: #2ecc71; } QMenuBar { background-color: #f5f5f5; color: #000000; border-bottom: 1px solid #cccccc; } QMenu { background-color: #ffffff; color: #000000; border: 1px solid #cccccc; } QMenu::item:selected { background-color: #0066cc; color: #ffffff; }

ocean.name: Thème Océan
ocean.description: Thème inspiré par les teintes océaniques
ocean.stylesheet: QMainWindow { background-color: #0a1929; } QWidget { background-color: #0a1929; color: #e3f2fd; } QPushButton { background-color: #1a3a52; color: #e3f2fd; border: 1px solid #00bcd4; padding: 8px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: bold; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #00bcd4; color: #0a1929; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #0097a7; } QCheckBox { color: #e3f2fd; spacing: 8px; font-weight: bold; } QCheckBox::indicator { width: 20px; height: 20px; border-radius: 3px; } QCheckBox::indicator:unchecked { background-color: #1a3a52; border: 2px solid #00bcd4; } QCheckBox::indicator:checked { background-color: #27ae60; border: 2px solid #27ae60; image: url(data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 20 20'><text x='2' y='16' font-size='16' font-weight='bold' fill='white'>✓</text></svg>); } QCheckBox::indicator:checked:hover { background-color: #2ecc71; } QMenuBar { background-color: #0a1929; color: #e3f2fd; border-bottom: 1px solid #1a3a52; } QMenu { background-color: #0a1929; color: #e3f2fd; border: 1px solid #1a3a52; } QMenu::item:selected { background-color: #00bcd4; color: #0a1929; }

forest.name: Thème Forêt
forest.description: Thème inspiré par les teintes de la nature
forest.stylesheet: QMainWindow { background-color: #1b3a1b; } QWidget { background-color: #1b3a1b; color: #e8f5e9; } QPushButton { background-color: #2e7d32; color: #e8f5e9; border: 1px solid #4caf50; padding: 8px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: bold; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #4caf50; color: #1b3a1b; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #388e3c; } QCheckBox { color: #e8f5e9; spacing: 8px; font-weight: bold; } QCheckBox::indicator { width: 20px; height: 20px; border-radius: 3px; } QCheckBox::indicator:unchecked { background-color: #2e7d32; border: 2px solid #4caf50; } QCheckBox::indicator:checked { background-color: #27ae60; border: 2px solid #27ae60; image: url(data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 20 20'><text x='2' y='16' font-size='16' font-weight='bold' fill='white'>✓</text></svg>); } QCheckBox::indicator:checked:hover { background-color: #2ecc71; } QMenuBar { background-color: #1b3a1b; color: #e8f5e9; border-bottom: 1px solid #2e7d32; } QMenu { background-color: #1b3a1b; color: #e8f5e9; border: 1px solid #2e7d32; } QMenu::item:selected { background-color: #4caf50; color: #1b3a1b; }

sunset.name: Thème Coucher de Soleil
sunset.description: Thème avec des teintes chaudes de coucher de soleil
sunset.stylesheet: QMainWindow { background-color: #2c1810; } QWidget { background-color: #2c1810; color: #ffe8d6; } QPushButton { background-color: #5c3d2e; color: #ffe8d6; border: 1px solid #ff6b35; padding: 8px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: bold; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #ff6b35; color: #2c1810; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #e55100; } QCheckBox { color: #ffe8d6; spacing: 8px; font-weight: bold; } QCheckBox::indicator { width: 20px; height: 20px; border-radius: 3px; } QCheckBox::indicator:unchecked { background-color: #5c3d2e; border: 2px solid #ff6b35; } QCheckBox::indicator:checked { background-color: #27ae60; border: 2px solid #27ae60; image: url(data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 20 20'><text x='2' y='16' font-size='16' font-weight='bold' fill='white'>✓</text></svg>); } QCheckBox::indicator:checked:hover { background-color: #2ecc71; } QMenuBar { background-color: #2c1810; color: #ffe8d6; border-bottom: 1px solid #5c3d2e; } QMenu { background-color: #2c1810; color: #ffe8d6; border: 1px solid #5c3d2e; } QMenu::item:selected { background-color: #ff6b35; color: #2c1810; }

purple.name: Thème Violet
purple.description: Thème élégant avec des teintes violettes
purple.stylesheet: QMainWindow { background-color: #2d1b4e; } QWidget { background-color: #2d1b4e; color: #f3e5f5; } QPushButton { background-color: #512da8; color: #f3e5f5; border: 1px solid #9c27b0; padding: 8px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: bold; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #9c27b0; color: #2d1b4e; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #7b1fa2; } QCheckBox { color: #f3e5f5; spacing: 8px; font-weight: bold; } QCheckBox::indicator { width: 20px; height: 20px; border-radius: 3px; } QCheckBox::indicator:unchecked { background-color: #512da8; border: 2px solid #9c27b0; } QCheckBox::indicator:checked { background-color: #27ae60; border: 2px solid #27ae60; image: url(data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 20 20'><text x='2' y='16' font-size='16' font-weight='bold' fill='white'>✓</text></svg>); } QCheckBox::indicator:checked:hover { background-color: #2ecc71; } QMenuBar { background-color: #2d1b4e; color: #f3e5f5; border-bottom: 1px solid #512da8; } QMenu { background-color: #2d1b4e; color: #f3e5f5; border: 1px solid #512da8; } QMenu::item:selected { background-color: #9c27b0; color: #2d1b4e; }
